p: DPPH and ABTS free radical inhibitory potential of Fa.Met, Fa.Hex, Fa.Chf, Fa.EtAc, Fa.Bn and Fa.Aq are presented in Figure 2C,D. The results revealed that highest percent free radical scavenging potential was exhibited by Fa.EtAc fraction against DPPH and ABTS with lowest IC 50 values of 100 and 120 µg/mL, respectively ( Table S2). Ascorbic acid was used as a positive control that caused 91.32 ± 0.34 and 95.31 ± 0.75 % inhibition at 1000 µg/mL against DPPH and ABTS with IC 50 value 30 and 45 µg/mL.
